@@info: Here are translations that exist in <en> but not in <zh-HK>.
After editing this file, you can run 'dart run slang apply --locale=zh-HK' to quickly apply the newly added translations.

send.shareViaLinkAutoAccept: 用 link 分享檔案嗰陣自動接收
send.@info: Translating to 接收 rather than 接受 is intentional to reflect the actual usage.
